Headline: Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/North
ShortDescription: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand: due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand and the resume their normal route at  Narragansett, due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Trains bypassing Clark/lake Station
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at Clark/lake station due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at Clark/lake station due to police activity.

Shuttle Buses are requested form Washington to Grand/Milwaukee to provide connecting service in both direction.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
